header.title: Sri Lanka
header.subtitle: COVID-19 Memorial
header.seoDisc: A online memorial for all those who died during the pandemic in Sri Lanka

home.title: {total} people have died due to the pandemic in Sri Lanka
home.subtitle: This memorial has so far documented the details of {count} of them. Each flower represents one person and shares their age, sex and where they are from, as recorded by the government.

footer.title: COVID-19 Memorial
footer.subtitle: In memory of those we lost to COVID-19 in Sri Lanka.
